original_text: But a young woman like that might make a promise to God and then marry a husband. She might have promised something when she had not thought carefully about it.
korean_text: 또 혹시 남편을 맞을 때에 서원이나 결심한 서약을 경솔하게 그의 입술로 말하였으면

sentences.original_text: But a young woman like that
might make a promise to God

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 남편과 결혼할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: when she had not thought carefully about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에 대해 신중하게 생각하지 않았을 때
